column3: Faculty of Management, Economics and Social Sciences
column5: This major of the Master of Science in Business Administration covers methods and instruments of strategic corporate management and developement as well as human rescource management.
column7: At the University of Cologne there are no tuition fees, just a biannual social contribution fee of slightly more than 300 euros, which includes the semester ticket for public transport throughout North Rhine-Westphalia. Invest in an excellent education and your future without paying a fortune.
